com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.upajprovperf

Class IProviderThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.common.ProviderThread
        • com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.upajprovperf.IProviderThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.reactor.DefaultMsgCallback, com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.reactor.ProviderCallback, com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.reactor.RDMDictionaryMsgCallback, com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.reactor.RDMDirectoryMsgCallback, com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.reactor.RDMLoginMsgCallback, com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.reactor.ReactorChannelEventCallback, java.lang.Runnable

    public class IProviderThread
extends ProviderThread
implements com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.reactor.ProviderCallback
    Interactive provider implementation of the provider thread callback. Handles accepting of new channels, processing of incoming messages and sending of message bursts.
